A

addNewContact() - Static method in class ContactsApp
method used for adding a new contact with mandatory details (id, first name, last name, phone number) and optional details (email and address)

C

choosingContact() - Static method in class ContactsApp
method used for choosing a contact, user inputs id and method seeks it from existing data
ContactsApp - Class in Unnamed Package
The class ContactsApp contains methods relating to storing, accessing and editing contact information
ContactsApp() - Constructor for class ContactsApp
 

D

deleteContact(int) - Static method in class ContactsApp
method used for deleting a contact, if no match prints out no target found

E

editContact(int) - Static method in class ContactsApp
method used for editing a contact, if no match prints out no target found

L

listSynch() - Static method in class ContactsApp
method used for synchronizing text file data to arraylist

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class ContactsApp
main method runs methods to synch up information, present main menu and take user's initial feed to use the application. if no text file exists one is created

P

printContactBook() - Static method in class ContactsApp
prints out choices to quit or return to main menu
printContactBookMenu() - Static method in class ContactsApp
prints out choices to quit or return to main menu
printMainMenu() - Static method in class ContactsApp
prints out main menu choices user has to use the application

S

saveToContactBook() - Static method in class ContactsApp
method used for saving array list data to a text file

U

userChoice(int) - Static method in class ContactsApp
switch-case operating via int, runs method based on received feed
userInputMenu() - Static method in class ContactsApp
receives and validates user's input to use mainMenu/contactBookMenu choices.
